params.user: The address of the user to check

params.maliciousPowerseller: The address of the user that will lose the badge

params.to: The address of the user that will receive the badge

params.shopAddress: The address of the shop contract

checkPrivilege(address).notice: Checks if the address holds a Trusted badge

removePowersellerNFT(address).notice: Removes the PowerSeller badge from bad a user

safeMint(address).notice: Mints a PowerSeller badge for the user

setShop(address).notice: Sets the shop address as the new Control role

totalPowersellers().notice: Returns the total number of users that received a PowerSeller badge
